telegram.welcomeMessage: Welcome $user, use $command to setup your account. If you have any problems contact me at @Username
telegram.usernameSuccessMessage: Noice now you can activate the reminder with the command $command
telegram.usernameMessage: Cool. Right your username as it is like in the Excel file. Ex: Elon
telegram.usernameErrorMessage: Opsie seems like the entered username is wrong. Retry again using the comand $command
telegram.notificationOnMessage: All done. If you want to disable notification use command $command
telegram.initErrorMessage: Error seems like you didn't setup your username. Use $command to set it up
telegram.notificationOffMessage: Notification disabled for your username. $command to re-enable it
telegram.genericErrorMessage: Damn seems like you did something wrong. That's so sad. Try to start over /start
